trans-unit.source: Provides classes that enable rapidly copying the property settings of a print system object to another object of the same type.
trans-unit.target: Fornece classes que permitem copiar rapidamente as configurações de propriedade de um objeto do sistema de impressão para outro objeto do mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: Also, enables iteration through the properties of print system objects and the discovery of their types at run time, without using reflection.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, habilita a iteração pelas propriedades dos objetos do sistema de impressão e a descoberta de seus tipos em tempo de execução sem usar reflexão.

trans-unit.source: This namespace contains the following core classes:
trans-unit.target: Este namespace contém as classes principais a seguir:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty> class, which is the base class for most of the other classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty> classe, que é a classe base para a maioria das outras classes.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintPropertyDictionary>, which is a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> whose entries are all instances of classes derived from <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintPropertyDictionary>, que é um <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> cujas entradas são todas as instâncias de classes derivadas de <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty>.

trans-unit.source: This namespace makes it possible to discover at run time, without using reflection, the types of the properties of print system objects, such as <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer>, <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>, or <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Esse namespace, é possível descobrir em tempo de execução sem o uso de reflexão, os tipos de propriedades de objetos do sistema de impressão, como <xref:System.Printing.PrintServer>, <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>, ou <xref:System.Printing.PrintSystemJobInfo>.

trans-unit.source: For examples that show the use of the classes in this namespace, see <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty>, <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty>, and <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintPropertyDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos que mostram o uso das classes nesse namespace, consulte <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintBooleanProperty>, <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintProperty>, e <xref:System.Printing.IndexedProperties.PrintPropertyDictionary>.

trans-unit.source: This namespace is part of the enhanced printing services provided with Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).
trans-unit.target: Este namespace é parte dos serviços de impressão aprimorados fornecidos com o Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF).

trans-unit.source: Managed code developers using Windows Forms must use the APIs in the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de código gerenciado usando o Windows Forms devem usar as APIs no <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
